title: "Valerie" logo on box of chocolates
content:
I’m curious to find what typeface is used on this box of chocolates from the company Valerie. I have a feeling it is a custom typeface, but if you can recommend something close, I’d appreciate it!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003559im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSCF1827_5779.JPG)

 [‹ 25th Anniversary](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003559/http:/typophile.com/node/32884 "Go to previous forum topic") [I wanna know what LOVE is ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003559/http:/typophile.com/node/27607 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dee gee

comments.content: You wouldn’t have to mess around with [Freight Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003559/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/garagefonts/freight-sans/) too much to duplicate this....
Freight Sans Light will workout great. Thanks!
The R certainly isn’t, although the E is closer....
